cards.detail: You recently had a condition recorded that may be an adverse event from high blood pressure treatment. Contacting your care team will help them resolve it.|[{"id": "adverseevent-AE-TreatedAndUntreated-2", "type": "adverse-event", "label": "Brief loss of consciousness"}]|at-most-one|

cards.summary: See care team and discuss treatment for hypertension.
cards.detail: You recently had a condition recorded that may be an adverse event from high blood pressure treatment; you noted to us that this was already treated, but if it recurs or doesn't get better, please contact your care team.|[ { "id": "contact-suggestion", "label": "Contact care team Adverse Event", "type": "suggestion-link", "actions": [{"label":"Contact your care team about your condition(s): Acute kidney problem" , "url":"/contact"}] } ]|at-most-one|
